property.name: message
property.value: Your knowledge of the asylum grounds serves you well in construction and mining. You gain bonus rewards in Builder quests!

property.name: message
property.value: Your garden therapy experience gives you an edge in farming. You gain bonus rewards in Farmer quests!

property.name: message
property.value: Your kitchen therapy training makes you a master chef. You gain bonus rewards in Chef quests!

property.name: message
property.value: Your security background makes you a natural hunter. You gain bonus rewards in Hunter quests!

property.name: message
property.value: Your medical background serves you well in healing arts. You gain bonus rewards in Medic quests!

property.name: message
property.value: Your repair therapy skills make you an expert mechanic. You gain bonus rewards in Mechanic quests!

property.name: message
property.value: Your military training makes you a formidable soldier. You gain bonus rewards in Soldier quests!
